oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bicentennial Capitol Mall State Park World War II Memorial
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color photograph of a globe and five pillars found at the World War II memorial at Bicentennial Capitol Mall State Park in Nashville, Tennessee. The five pillars in this photo are titled (L to R): "Outrage," "Resolve," "Valor," "Fortitude," and "Victory." Features a divided back and location on reverse.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: State parks & reserves; Monuments & memorials
